question.value: Please submit your enrollment form to the admissions office before the end of this week.

chinese.value: 请在本周末前将您的报名表提交给招生办公室。

germany.value: Bitte reichen Sie Ihr Einschreibungsformular vor Ende dieser Woche im Zulassungsbüro ein.

japanese.value: この週末までに、入学申込書を入学課に提出してください。

germanyAcademicVocabulary.value: [{"word":"Einschreibungsformular","phonetic":"ˈaɪnʃraɪbʊŋsˌfɔːmʊlaːr","definition":"ein Formular zum Einschreiben"},{"word":"Zulassungsbüro","phonetic":"tsuˈlasʊŋsbʏro","definition":"eine Organisation, die für die Zulassung oder Ablehnung von Bewerbern zuständig ist"}]

japaneseAcademicVocabulary.value: [{"word":"入学課","phonetic":"にゅうがくか","definition":"入学手続きを行う部署"},{"word":"提出","phonetic":"ていしゅつ","definition":"書類などを出すこと"}]

academicVocabulary.value: [{"word":"enrollment","phonetic":"ɪnˈrəʊlmənt","definition":"the action of enrolling or being enrolled"},{"word":"admissions","phonetic":"ədˈmɪʃənz","definition":"the process of being allowed to enter a place, organization or institution."}]
